settings.tab_content:
Delivery Overview

A shipping confirmation email that contains tracking details is sent to you within 24 hours of dispatch.

Due to the furniture being either assembled or pre-assembled,
we need to use the services of a national carrier as they are too big
for Australia Post so we use Team GE or Star Track.

If no one is present when delivery is attempted a notification card will be left allowing you to easily retrieve your item(s).

Click here for additional details.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE

We’re committed to helping you find those perfect dining chairs,
dining tables & bar stools and we want you to feel confident when
shopping with us and that’s why we have our exclusive lifetime warranty
on chairs & bar stools and 5 years warranty on dining tables.

In the unlikely event of damage, a fault, or you simply decide that the item isn't right for your space, we understand.

Click here to view our full returns policy.

Delivery Overview

A shipping confirmation email that contains tracking details is sent to you within 24 hours of dispatch.

Due to these dining chairs being either assembled or pre-assembled, we need to use the services of a national carrier as they are too big for Australia Post so we use TNT or TOLL.

If no one is present when delivery is attempted a notification card will be left allowing you to easily retrieve your item(s).

Click here for additional details.
settings.tab_wa:
Delivery Overview

These Globewest products will be despatched from Canning Vale WA 6155.

Please allow 2 days to fulfil your order than allow 2 – 5 business days for delivery.


We are unable to ship outside of Western Australia due to sales territory agreement with Globewest so any purchases to be shipped outside of Western Australia will be cancelled and refunded.

Globewest products will be delivered by 1-man to residential / commercial property with no stairs.

If you have stairs than there will be extra fees charged for a 2 man team to deliver your furniture – please reach out to support@onlydiningchairs.com.au if this is the case.

The delivery will be done via a professional furniture transporter who will organise a time with you to make sure someone is home to receive unless permission to leave safe.

settings.head: Shop Now Pay Later
settings.btext-1: Spread the cost of your order easily in monthly installments upto 6 months.
settings.btext-2: Every purchase is entirely interest free, no matter the price or term length.
settings.btext-3: The recurring card payments are collected monthly until your balance is paid, but you can make additional payments.

settings.caption: Benefit 01:
settings.heading: We Offer 5 Year Warranties
settings.text: We believe in the quality of our products, which is why, unlike other furniture retailers – we are willing to stand by our products for much longer.

settings.caption: Benefit 02:
settings.heading: Natural Wear & Tear Coverage
settings.text: Yes – we are the only retailer were chairs & bar stools are covered for structural as well as natural wear and tear of upholstery ( PU Leathers, Fabric and Velvet) from daily use ( Conditions Apply )

settings.caption: Benefit 03:
settings.heading: Our Best Quality Furniture Or Your Money Back
settings.text: Buy with confidence - We stand by our furniture so if you receive your furniture in unsatisfactory condition – we will replace or refund

settings.caption: Benefit 04:
settings.heading: Every Sale We Donate to Cancer Council
settings.text:
As you settle into the comfort of our meticulously crafted furniture, remember that your purchase is infused with hope.

Hope for a future where cancer is no longer a cause for fear, where treatment is more effective, and where lives can be saved and cherished for generations to come.

Shop our furniture today and let your purchase leave a lasting impact on the lives of cancer patients and their families.

settings.heading: 1. Do We Have A Showroom?
settings.row_content:
No, as a predominantly online store we do not have our showroom.

However, SOME of our furniture can be viewed in our supplier’s showroom and this will be noted on that particular furniture’s product page with “Showroom” tab. If you are unsure, please reach out to support@onlydiningchairs.com.au

settings.heading: 2. Why Should I buy From You Rather Then Another Store?
settings.row_content:
That’s a very valid question to ask. We feel that our “after sale” customer service sets us apart from the rest.

With our 5 year warranty and regular wear and tear coverage on all chairs & bar stools in a residential setting means that we are happy to help you long after our competitor’s 1 to 2-year warranty has expired.

settings.heading: 3. How Long Will My Delivery Take?
settings.row_content:
• All orders take one to two business days to be prepared for despatch then depending on the furniture you are purchasing, will determine your delivery times.
  • For exact times- see that specific product page and there is a “Shipping” section and this will guide you.
  • For a quick answer- as a general rule as follows:
  • For VIC, approximately 3 - 5 working days
  • For NSW, SA, ACT, approximately 4 - 8 working days
  • For QLD, NT,WA and TAS, approximately 7 - 10 working days.
  • We’ll let you know the tentative delivery date when you place your order in the order confirmation email.

settings.heading: 4. Can I Specify A Delivery Date?
settings.row_content: We can’t guarantee a delivery date, however we will try our best to arrange a delivery around your schedule. Once you have placed your order, you can get in touch with us via support@onlydiningchairs.com.au to let us know your delivery preference and we will see what we can do.

settings.heading: 5. How Can I Place A Bulk Order?
settings.row_content:
If you want a special quote for bulk purchase dining chairs, reach out to our customer support team at support@onlydiningchairs.com.au with the following information:-

→ Product name

→ Colour if applicable

→ How many you need

→ Delivery postcode

settings.heading: 6. What Are The Payment Options Which You Provide?
settings.row_content: We offer multiple payment options including all credit cards, Paypal, Apple Pay, Gpay as well as interest free options such as Afterpay, Humm and Zip Pay amongst others.

settings.heading: 7. Do You Provide Warranty For Your Dining Chairs?
settings.row_content: Yes we provide our 5 year warranty on all furniture in a residential setting as well as regular wear and tear coverage on our chairs and bar stools

settings.heading: 8. Is There Any First-time Customer Discount?
settings.row_content: Yes, use coupon code “NEW5” at checkout for 5% off your entire order!

settings.heading: 9. How Are The Dining Chairs Delivered?
settings.row_content:
For smaller, flat packed chairs – Australia Post.

For partly assembled and fully assembled chairs – Team GE or Star Track generally.

Other couriers may help us out from time to time in certain areas of Australia such as Direct Freight Express, Allied Express or Direct Couriers

settings.heading: 10. Do I Need To Assemble This Chair?
settings.row_content: For Partly Assembled Chairs- Yes, these chairs come partly assembled and are usually a matter of screwing the legs into the base of the seat – a quick 5 minute or less job!

settings.heading: 11. What If My Chairs Arrive Damaged?
settings.row_content: Don’t worry. We will lodge an inquiry with the transport company who was in charge of looking after it and they will conduct a thorough search and provide a response generally within 4 business days.

settings.heading: 12. What If I Change My Mind?
settings.row_content: No worries. You have 30 days since the day you received the chairs to let us know – Any chairs or stools not eligible for a change of mind return from our supplier ( such as Globewest ) ,  will be mentioned at the bottom of the product page.

settings.heading: YOU GOT QUESTIONS? WE GOT YOUR ANSWERS!
